Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Peptide #22 (coding seq: rarv_10.1_19, peptide 6; natural AMPs; frogs, amphibians, animals; XXA; UCLL1c)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of the peptide shows 46.2% similarity toHeterin-2. GRAVY: 1.2; Mol Wt:  2287.728; Mol formula: C108H176N25O29.Activity:  Active against S. aureus ATCC 29213 (MIC 4-16 uM) and E-coli (MIC >64 uM) evaluated using microdilution assay in MH medium. Active against E. faecalis ATCC 29212 (MIC 16 uM), and A. baumannii ATCC 19606 (MIC 32 uM).Toxicity: At 100 uM, over 80% monocytes survived (MTT assays). Updated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Roncevic T, Gerdol M, Spazzali F, Florian F, Mekinic S, Tossi A, Pallavicini A.2018
Literature Information.Title: Parallel identification of novel antimicrobial peptide sequences from multiple anuran species by targeted DNA sequencing.
